info.description:
This story occurs at an after school club (call it what you like). Carrie (our giantess)goes to the bathroom, but when she comes back, she sees that everyone has left! She soon discovers her 2-inch tall friends and decides to advantage of their situation for a once in a lifetime experience.

Carrie can't die(duh)

Keep Carrie in the school building unless I intend for her to leave, in which case she will go home (and play Super smash Bros. Brawl! :) ).

boob, hand, pussy, mouthplay, unaware(but she has to be aware at SOME point), and insertion
NO FEET, NO ASS
